## Remarks This enumeration is used by the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.GridLinesVisibility%2A> property.
The style of the grid lines is determined by the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.VerticalGridLinesBrush%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.HorizontalGridLinesBrush%2A> properties.
